items.title: Introduction
items.subTitle: A lightweight, customizable Vue UI library for mobile web apps.

items.title: Quickstart
items.subTitle: Through this chapter, you can learn how to install Vant and its basic usage.

items.title: Advanced Usage
items.subTitle: Through this chapter, you can learn about some advanced usages of Vant.

items.title: FAQ
items.subTitle: Vant provides the ability to customize the theme based on CSS variables, and can uniformly modify the component style. For details, see ConfigProvider Global Configuration component.

items.title: Changelog
items.subTitle: From v4.9.0, Vant's changelog will be published on GitHub's Releases Page. This page will no longer be updated.

items.title: 4.0 Release Note
items.subTitle: After a year of iterations, Vant 4.0 has been officially released, which is the fourth major version of Vant since it was open-sourced in 2017.

items.title: Upgrade from v2 to v3
items.subTitle: This document provides an upgrade guide from Vant 2 to Vant 3.

items.title: Upgrade from v3 to v4
items.subTitle: This document provides an upgrade guide from Vant 3 to Vant 4.

items.title: Contribution Guide
items.subTitle: Thank you for using Vant. Below are the guidelines for submitting feedback or code to Vant. Please take a few minutes to read the following before submitting an issue or PR to Vant.

items.title: Design Resources
items.subTitle: You can download Vant's design resources here.

items.title: Internationalization
items.subTitle: Vant uses Chinese as the default language. If you want to use other languages, please follow the instructions below.

items.title: Button
items.subTitle: Buttons are used to trigger an action, such as submitting a form.

items.title: Cell
items.subTitle: The cell is a single display item in the list.

items.title: ConfigProvider
items.subTitle: Used to configure Vant components globally, providing dark mode, theme customization and other capabilities.

items.title: Icon
items.subTitle: The font-based icon set that can be used via the Icon component or referenced in other components via the icon attribute.

items.title: Image
items.subTitle: Enhanced img tag with multiple image fill modes, support for image lazy loading, loading hint, loading failure hint.

items.title: Layout
items.subTitle: Quickly and easily create layouts with van-row and van-col.

items.title: Popup
items.subTitle: Used to display pop-up windows, information prompts, etc., and supports multiple pop-up layers to display.

items.title: Space
items.subTitle: Set the spacing between elements.

items.title: Built-in style
items.subTitle: Vant contains some common styles that can be used directly by the className.

items.title: Toast
items.subTitle: Black semi-transparent pop-up hint in the middle of the page, used for message notification, loading hint, operation result hint and other scenarios.

items.title: Calendar
items.subTitle: Calendar component for selecting dates or date ranges.

items.title: Cascader
items.subTitle: The cascader component is used for the selection of multi-level data. The typical scene is the selection of provinces and cities.

items.title: Checkbox
items.subTitle: A group of options for multiple choices.

items.title: DatePicker
items.subTitle: Used to select date, usually used with the Popup component.

items.title: Field
items.subTitle: Field component let users enter and edit text.

items.title: Form
items.subTitle: Used for data entry and verification, and supports input boxes, radio buttons, check boxes, file uploads and other types. Should be used with Field component.

items.title: NumberKeyboard
items.subTitle: The NumberKeyboard component can be used with PasswordInput component or custom input box components.

items.title: PasswordInput
items.subTitle: The PasswordInput component is usually used with NumberKeyboard Component.

items.title: Picker
items.subTitle: The picker component is usually used with Popup Component.

items.title: PickerGroup
items.subTitle: Used to combine multiple Picker components, allow users to select multiple value.

items.title: Radio
items.subTitle: Single selection among multiple options.

items.title: Rate
items.subTitle: The rate component is used for rating things.

items.title: Search
items.subTitle: Input box component for search scenarios.

items.title: Slider
items.subTitle: Used to select a value within a given range.

items.title: Signature
items.subTitle: Component for signature scene, based on Canvas. Please upgrade vant to >= v4.3.0 before using this component.

items.title: Stepper
items.subTitle: The stepper component consists of an increase button, a decrease button and an input box, which are used to input and adjust numbers within a certain range.

items.title: Switch
items.subTitle: Used to switch between open and closed states.

items.title: TimePicker
items.subTitle: Used to select time, usually used with the Popup component.

items.title: Uploader
items.subTitle: Used to upload a local image or file to the server and display a preview image and upload progress during the upload process. The Uploader component does not currently contain the interface logic for uploading files to the server, this step needs to be implemented by the user.

items.title: ActionSheet
items.subTitle: The pop-up modal panel at the bottom contains multiple options related to the current situation.

items.title: Barrage
items.subTitle: To realize the critical subtitle function when watching the video. Please upgrade vant to >= v4.4.0 before using this component.

items.title: Dialog
items.subTitle: A modal box pops up on the page, which is often used for message prompts, message confirmation, or to complete specific interactive operations in the current page. It supports two methods: component call and function call.

items.title: DropdownMenu
items.subTitle: The menu list that pops down downwards.

items.title: FloatingPanel
items.subTitle: A panel that floats at the bottom of a page, which can be dragged up and down to browse content, often used to provide additional functionality or information. Please upgrade vant to >= v4.5.0 before using this component.

items.title: FloatingBubble
items.subTitle: Clickable bubbles that hover around the edge of the page. Please upgrade vant to >= v4.6.0 before using this component.

items.title: Loading
items.subTitle: Used to indicate the transition state during loading.

items.title: Notify
items.subTitle: The display message prompt is at the top of the page, and supports two methods: component call and function call.

items.title: Overlay
items.subTitle: Create a mask layer to emphasize specific page elements and prevent users from performing other operations.

items.title: PullRefresh
items.subTitle: Used to provide interactive operations for pull-down refresh.

items.title: ShareSheet
items.subTitle: A pop-up sharing panel at the bottom for displaying the action buttons corresponding to each sharing channel, without specific sharing logic.

items.title: SwipeCell
items.subTitle: Used for cell components that can slide left and right to display operation buttons.

items.title: Badge
items.subTitle: Display a small badge or a red dot to the top-right of its child.

items.title: Circle
items.subTitle: Circular progress bar component, and supports gradient color animation.

items.title: Collapse
items.subTitle: Place a group of content in multiple collapsible panels, click the title of the panel to expand or contract its content.

items.title: CountDown
items.subTitle: Used to display the countdown value in real time, and precision supports milliseconds.

items.title: Divider
items.subTitle: Separate content into multiple areas.

items.title: Empty
items.subTitle: Occupation reminder when empty.

items.title: Highlight
items.subTitle: Highlight the specified text content. Please upgrade vant to >= v4.8.0 before using this component.

items.title: ImagePreview
items.subTitle: Used to zoom in and preview the picture, and it supports two methods: function call and component call.

items.title: Lazyload
items.subTitle: When the page needs to load a large amount of content, delay loading the content outside the visible area of the page to make the page load smoother.

items.title: List
items.subTitle: A list component to show items and control loading status.

items.title: NoticeBar
items.subTitle: Used to display a group of message notifications in a continuons loop.

items.title: Popover
items.subTitle: Used to display some content on top of another.

items.title: Progress
items.subTitle: Used to show the current progress of the operation.

items.title: RollingText
items.subTitle: Rolling text animation, which can roll numbers and other types of text. Please upgrade vant to >= v4.6.0 before using this component.

items.title: Skeleton
items.subTitle: Used to display a set of placeholder graphics during the content loading process.

items.title: Steps
items.subTitle: Used to show the various parts of the action flow and let the user know where the current action fits into the overall flow.

items.title: Sticky
items.subTitle: The sticky component is consistent with the effect achieved by the position: sticky property in CSS, in that when the component is within screen range, it will follow the normal layout arrangement, and when the component rolls out of screen range, it will always be fixed at the top of the screen.

items.title: Swipe
items.subTitle: Used to loop a group of pictures or content.

items.title: Tag
items.subTitle: Used to mark keywords and summarize the main content.

items.title: TextEllipsis
items.subTitle: Display ellipsis for long text and support for expanding or collapsing text. Please upgrade vant to >= v4.1.0 before using this component.

items.title: Watermark
items.subTitle: Add specific text or patterns on the page as watermarks, which can be used to prevent information theft. Please upgrade vant to >= v4.2.0 before using this component.

items.title: ActionBar
items.subTitle: Used to provide convenient interaction for page-related operations.

items.title: BackTop
items.subTitle: A button to back to top.

items.title: Grid
items.subTitle: Used to divide the page into blocks of equal width in the horizontal direction for displaying content or page navigation.

items.title: IndexBar
items.subTitle: Used for indexed sorting display and quick positioning of lists.

items.title: NavBar
items.subTitle: Provide navigation function for the page, often used at the top of the page.

items.title: Pagination
items.subTitle: When the amount of data is too much, use pagination to separate the data, and load only one page at a time.

items.title: Sidebar
items.subTitle: The vertically displayed navigation bar is used to switch between different content areas.

items.title: Tab
items.subTitle: Used to switch between different content areas.

items.title: Tabbar
items.subTitle: Used to switch between different pages.

items.title: TreeSelect
items.subTitle: Used to select from a set of related data sets.

items.title: AddressEdit
items.subTitle: Used to create, update, and delete receiving addresses.

items.title: AddressList
items.subTitle: Display a list of receiving addresses.

items.title: Area
items.subTitle: A three-level linkage selection of provinces and cities, usually used in conjunction with Popup component.

items.title: Card
items.subTitle: Used to display product pictures, prices and other information.

items.title: ContactCard
items.subTitle: Display contact information in the form of cards.

items.title: ContactEdit
items.subTitle: Edit and save the contact information.

items.title: ContactList
items.subTitle: Used to display the contact list.

items.title: Coupon
items.subTitle: Used for redemption and selection of coupons.

items.title: SubmitBar
items.subTitle: Used to display the order amount and submit the order.

items.title: Intro
items.subTitle: Vant provide some built-in composition APIs, you can directly use these APIs for development.

items.title: useClickAway
items.subTitle: Triggers a callback when user clicks outside of the target element.

items.title: useCountDown
items.subTitle: Used to manage the countdown.

items.title: useCustomFieldValue
items.subTitle: Used to custom Field value.

items.title: useEventListener
items.subTitle: Attaching an event when the component is mounted and activated, then removing the event when the component is unmounted and deactivated.

items.title: usePageVisibility
items.subTitle: Get the visible state of the page.

items.title: useRect
items.subTitle: Get the size of an element and its position relative to the viewport, equivalent to Element.getBoundingClientRect.

items.title: useRelation
items.subTitle: Establish the association relationship between parent and child components, perform data communication and method invocation, based on provide and inject implementation.

items.title: useScrollParent
items.subTitle: Get the closest parent element that is scrollable.

items.title: useToggle
items.subTitle: Used to switch between true and false.

items.title: useWindowSize
items.subTitle: Get the viewport width and height of the browser window, and update it automatically when the window size changes.

items.title: useRaf
items.subTitle: Provide convenient call and cancellation of requestAnimationFrame.
